author: The Hairy Bikers
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/180C Fan/Gas 6.  Cut deep slits in the aubergines at regular intervals and on all sides. Stuff with the sliced garlic. Put on a baking tray and roast in the oven for 45 - 60 minutes. When the aubergines are ready, they should be soft, wrinkly and turning brown/black in colour. Put the aubergines in a colander and allow to cool a little. When they are cold enough to handle, peel off the skin. Squeeze gently to remove as much liquid as possible. Chop the aubergines finely. Put the aubergines in a bowl and add all of the remaining ingredients. Mix thoroughly. If you want a slightly smoother texture, you can use a stick blender or food processor.  Serve with blinis and sour cream, with a few pomegranate seeds sprinkled over.
ingredients: 2 large aubergines,  4 garlic cloves, 2 thinly sliced and 2 crushed,  1 lemon, juice only,  2 tbsp olive oil,  2 tbsp finely chopped parsley,  2 tbsp finely chopped mint,  50g/1Â¾oz walnuts, finely chopped ,  blinis,  sour cream,  pomegranate seeds
